summary: Don`t like the default housecarls? Well, this mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
=====HOUSECARLS REMADE=====

1.Intro
2.Info
3.Compatibility
4.Install
5.Uninstall
6.Credits

1.INTRO
Don\'t Like the default Housecarls? Well, this mod is for you!
For me the housecarls were a bit ugly, so i made a mod to fix that!

2.INFO
All Housecarls WILL be edited to look nicer.
Housecarls:                                         Housecarls Done:
Lydia-Whiterun                                     Lydia-Whiterun
Calder-Windhelm                                   Jordis the Sword-Maiden-Solitude
Argis the Bulwark-Markarth
Iona-Riften
Jordis the Sword-Maiden-Solitude

3.COMPATIBILITY
DOES NOT WORK WITH ANY MOD THAT EFFECTS HOUSECARLS (unsure if dialogue but sure with appearance changing mods) DOES NOT WORK WITH UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul)
Needs 1 mod
ApachiiSkyHair:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

4.INSTALL
Extract all files from \"{name of file}\". Then move the stufff from the \"Data\" folder to:

\"C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data\"

or

\"C:/Program Files (x86)/The Elder Scrolls Skyrim/Data\" i think.

5.UNINSTALL
Delete the files you placed in the \"Data\" folder.

6.CREDITS
Skyrim NPC Editor by foretrenty for the help with editing the NPCS.
here:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii for the hair.
here:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
author: borderlands117
